name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 10+ years of experience in delivering high-performance software solutions, specializing in **TypeScript**, **Node.js**, **Python**, **AWS**, and **Kubernetes**. Proficient in designing and developing **REST APIs** and utilizing **PostgreSQL** and **Redis** for efficient data management. Extensive experience with CI/CD practices using **GitHub Actions** and **Jenkins** to ensure rapid, reliable software delivery. Expertise in modern frameworks and libraries including **React.js**, within dynamic full stack environments.

Demonstrated ability to build cloud-native applications on platforms like **AWS** while ensuring compliance with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Proven skills in microservices architecture and event-driven systems, with a focus on secure and maintainable solutions. Additionally, brings practical experience in MLOps with tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**, driving real-world impact through intelligent analytics, automation, and decision-making.

• Leveraged **AWS** for cloud services and **Kubernetes** for container orchestration, optimizing deployment processes and achieving a **95%** uptime across applications.
• Built and maintained **PostgreSQL** and **Redis** databases for high-performance data storage and retrieval, managing databases of over **1 million** health and financial records.
• Created continuous integration and deployment pipelines using **GitHub Actions** and **Jenkins**, streamlining development workflows with a focus on code quality and rapid iterations, achieving deployment speeds up to **5 times** faster.
• Developed applications with modern front-end technologies, including **React.js**, ensuring seamless user experiences with a focus on responsive design principles and accessibility standards.
• Employed DevOps strategies and practices, leading to a reduction in deployment-related issues by **30%** and enhancing developer collaboration through shared repositories and automated testing protocols.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams, including data scientists, to integrate machine learning capabilities and provide predictive insights, enhancing application intelligence by incorporating features powered by trained models.
• Contributed to the modernization of legacy systems by introducing microservices architecture, significantly improving system maintainability and scalability, resulting in better resource utilization.
• Established security best practices around development processes, focusing on frameworks like **Express** and maintaining compliance with industry standards like HIPAA and GDPR.
• Ensured application performance optimization by monitoring key metrics, applying **Terraform** for infrastructure as code, and managing configurations effectively.

Expertly crafted robust **REST API** solutions using **Node.js** (Express) and **Python** (Django), ensuring seamless integration and functionality within financial platforms.
Leveraged **TypeScript** to enhance code quality and maintainability in front-end applications built with **React.js** (18), achieving a performance optimization of up to **25%**.
Spearheaded the transition to a microservices architecture, improving system scalability and maintainability, and processing up to **1,000** simultaneous transactions.
Utilized **PostgreSQL** and **Redis** for efficient data storage and caching strategies, enhancing application response times by **40%**.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines with **GitHub Actions** and **Jenkins**, expediting deployment cycles and reducing rollback rates by **15%**.
Collaborated in an agile environment, employing tools such as **Kubernetes** for container orchestration and improving team productivity through automated deployments.
Designed and developed high-quality ETL processes utilizing **Terraform**, **Apache Airflow**, and **AWS** for reliable data ingestion from diverse sources.
Executed real-time analytics applications using **D3.js** and **Power BI Embedded**, providing stakeholders with actionable insights and reports on financial transactions.
Enhanced application security through best practices and tools, ensuring compliance with industry standards in banking systems.

• Developed backend services using **Node.js** (Express) and **Python** (Django, FastAPI) to build scalable and high-performing REST APIs for e-commerce platforms, achieving **99.9% uptime**.
• Optimized application performance with **Redis** for caching and **PostgreSQL** for reliable data storage, reducing average response time by **40%** during peak traffic.
• Collaborated with frontend teams to create seamless interfaces using **React.js** and **TypeScript**, enhancing user experience through fast, responsive designs compatible with **HTML5/CSS3** standards.
• Leveraged **AWS** services for deployment, ensuring efficient resource management and cost-effectiveness, reducing operational costs by **25%**.
• Implemented CI/CD pipelines with **GitHub Actions** and **Jenkins**, which streamlined code integration and application delivery, providing faster deployment cycles by **30%**.
• Deployed application services using **Kubernetes**, facilitating container orchestration and scalability, contributing to a deployment frequency of up to **20 times per week**.
• Integrated third-party payment systems such as **Stripe**, **PayPal**, and **Razorpay**, ensuring secure transactions and compliance with PCI-DSS standards.
• Drove tooling and infrastructure automation with **Terraform** to improve infrastructure management efficiency and consistency across development and production environments.
• Applied robust security measures, including **OAuth 2.0** for user authentication and role-based access control, maintaining strict adherence to GDPR requirements to protect user data.
